attributes.action: Shorten the waiting list for ADHD/ADD patients
attributes.additional_details: Mental health services in this country are abysmal.  You're not taken seriously and put at the bottom of a priority list. This has to change!
attributes.background: ADHD is affecting people's lives on a serious level. People need urgent help and cannot wait 2-4 years

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local health services, including diagnosis and treatments for patients with ADHD/ADD are a matter for individual clinicians, NHS Trusts and Clinical Commissioning Groups (CCGs), not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make ASD and ADHD screening available to all children of nursery age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606855

Increase funding to pupil referral units to meet SEND needs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607411
